trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were 9 other sightings in Kansas City on or around October 4th 2011
Summary: Large glowing green disc flying near 40 Highway
divs: Sighting DetailsAs reported to ASD in person today: 'My cousin and I were driving west on 40 Highway towards the Royals Stadium when we noticed a disc-shaped object to our left (south) that was flying quickly from east to west, parallel to the highway. It was some distance away but very large. The entire thing was glowing green, like the whole object was a light, rather than lights on it. We immediately thought it was a UFO, even though neither of us believed in UFOs or aliens, and had never seen one before. It flew away from us towards the west in a straight line. The object was very large, and it would take three people held at arm's length to cover it up. I still can't believe what we saw, but it was definatley not a plane."
